hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct new fixdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Name, vw.Address, vw.OpenDate, vw.Phone, vw.Fax, vw.Township_Code, vw.City_Code, vw.State_Code ) from MNMVIW00021 as vw where convert(char(10), vw.OpenDate, 111) between convert(char(10), :sdate , 111) and convert(char(10),:edate, 111) and vw.AccountSignature like 'F%' and vw.SourceBranchCode =: branchno and vw.CurrencyCode =:cur and vw.Active = true

select distinct new fixdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Name, vw.Address, vw.OpenDate, vw.Phone, vw.Fax, vw.Township_Code, vw.City_Code, vw.State_Code ) from MNMVIW00021 as vw where convert(char(10), vw.OpenDate, 111) between convert(char(10), :sdate , 111) and convert(char(10),:edate, 111) and vw.AccountSignature like 'F%' and vw.SourceBranchCode =: branchno and vw.CurrencyCode =: cur and vw.AccruedStatus =: accruedstatus and vw.Active = true

select new fixdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Name, vw.Address, vw.OpenDate, vw.Phone, vw.Fax, vw.Township_Code, vw.City_Code, vw.State_Code ) from MNMVIW00021 as vw where convert(char(10), vw.OpenDate, 111) between convert(char(10), :sdate , 111) and convert(char(10),:edate, 111) and vw.SourceBranchCode =: branchno and vw.CurrencyCode =: cur and vw.AccountSignature =: acsign and vw.Active = true

select new fixdto ( vw.AccountNo, vw.Name, vw.Address, vw.OpenDate, vw.Phone, vw.Fax, vw.Township_Code, vw.City_Code, vw.State_Code ) from MNMVIW00021 as vw where convert(char(10), vw.OpenDate, 111) between convert(char(10), :sdate , 111) and convert(char(10),:edate, 111) and vw.SourceBranchCode =: branchno and vw.CurrencyCode =: cur and vw.AccountSignature =: acsign and vw.AccruedStatus =: accruedstatus and vw.Active = true
